title: Newbie, Pixel 3 hot spot doesn't work. Erased the letters & numbers in password area.
content: I'm new to hot spots and my pixel 3. I got as far as seeing the numbers & letters, which I now assume was a way to enter and change my password. I erased those numbers thinking that I must use my Google password. Now I know it was wrong, but now what do I do?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
